edu.snu.onyx.runtime.executor

Class TaskGroupStateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.snu.onyx.runtime.executor.TaskGroupStateManager

  • public final class TaskGroupStateManager
extends Object
    Manages the states related to a task group. The methods of this class are synchronized.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TaskGroupStateManager(TaskGroup taskGroup, int attemptIdx, String executorId, PersistentConnectionToMasterMap persistentConnectionToMasterMap, MetricMessageSender metricMessageSender)

    • Method Detail

      • onTaskGroupStateChanged

        public void onTaskGroupStateChanged(TaskGroupState.State newState,
                                    Optional<List<String>> tasksPutOnHold,
                                    Optional<TaskGroupState.RecoverableFailureCause> cause)
        Updates the state of the task group.
        Parameters:
        newState - of the task group.
        tasksPutOnHold - the IDs of the tasks put on hold, empty otherwise.
        cause - only provided as non-empty upon recoverable failures.

      • onTaskStateChanged

        public void onTaskStateChanged(String taskId,
                               TaskState.State newState,
                               Optional<TaskGroupState.RecoverableFailureCause> cause)
        Updates the state of a task. Task state changes only occur in executor.
        Parameters:
        taskId - of the task.
        newState - of the task.
        cause - only provided as non-empty upon recoverable failures.
